constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Demolition of existing two storey house and erection of 2 x part two/three storey detached houses with associated landscaping, refuse and cycle parking facilities
decision_conditions: By reason of its contemporary design and appearance the proposed development is considered to appear out of context and would result in less than substantial harm to the the significance of the Southborough Conservation Area that would not be outweighed by any public benefit, thereby conflicting with Paragraph 196 of the NPPF 2019, Policies 7.4 and 7.8 of the London Plan 2016 and Policies CS8, DM10 and DM12 of the Core Strategy 2012.

The assessment of this application is based on measurements taken from the submitted drawings / plans. If it transpires that the drawings / plans submitted are incorrect this would nullify the validity of this decision and you are advised to submit a fresh application with the correct information / drawings.

The red outline on the Site Location Plan and Block Plans must be one single red line around the whole site, i.e. the red line must not be fragmented into different shapes as has been submitted on the latest Plan 01 PL REV A. Please amend the red lines to incorporate all land parcels within a single red line.
